thread.title: Divided House Republicans see savior in Paul Ryan
thread.title_full: Divided House Republicans see savior in Paul Ryan

title: Divided House Republicans see savior in Paul Ryan
text:
> Top News Divided House Republicans see savior in Paul Ryan Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis., center, and Rep. Trey Gowdy, R-S.C., arrive for a House GOP meeting on Capitol Hill in Washington, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. The pressure is on Ryan to run for House speaker in the chaotic aftermath of Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy's sudden decision to abandon his campaign for the post. (Doug Mills/ The New York Times via AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
